required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of B. Braun Peripheral Advantage Program on Complications, Indwell Time and First Stick Success of PIVC Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of the Effect of B. Braun Peripheral Advantage Program on Complications, Indwell Time and First Stick Success of PIVC Therapy

brief_summary.textblock:
Single sequence clinical study designed to evaluate the effectiveness of B. Braun PA on improved clinical outcomes, indwell time and first stick success of PIVC using B. Braun Peripheral Advantage (PA) by Registered Nurses (RNs).
The study will be conducted in the Emergency Department (ED) and/or Medical Surgical (MS) floor(s)/unit(s) in multiple hospitals.

clinical_study.why_stopped: This study was terminated due to recruitment futility resulting from the significant impact of the COVID-19 pandemic to our intended study population and facility personnel.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study will be divided into 4 Stages: 3 Clinical Stages and 1 Educational Stage.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of complications associated with PIVC use
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an estimate of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the impact of B. Braun Peripheral Advantage (PA) Program on the incidence of complications associated with PIVC use.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an estimate of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the effect of B. Braun PA on catheter indwell time associated with catheter insertion.

secondary_outcome.measure: First attempt success rates (first stick success)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an estimate of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the effect of B. Braun PA on first attempt success rates (first stick success) associated with catheter insertion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Aggregate costs associated with catheter insertion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an estimate of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the effect of B. Braun PA on aggregate costs associated with catheter insertion.

arm_group.description: Study site to use standard of care PIVC device(s) and procedure(s) on patients.
RN education and training in the use of B. Braun PIVC products, devices and procedures.
Familiarization of study RNs with the B. Braun devices and procedures in a clinical setting.
Study site uses B. Braun PIVC device(s) and procedure(s) on patients.

intervention.description: B. Braun PA includes: Christie VeinViewer® Vision2 , Introcan Safety® IV Catheters, STEADYCare™ Smallbore Extension Set, and the PA Education
Standard of Care for PIVC access per hospital protocol
